title: [Self-Directed] Near-Field Massive MIMO Integrated Sensing and Communication System Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Wireless communication systems fundamentals, linear algebra, and experience with deep learning frameworks
context.additional_context: Advanced course for professionals aiming to acquire practical beamforming optimization techniques applicable to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Design a beamforming algorithm that enhances integrated sensing-communication system performance by over 20% in near-field XL-MIMO environments.
Secure the ability to perform real-time optimization without channel estimation by utilizing a deep learning-based beamforming network.
Implement the STJRC framework capable of spatiotemporal beamforming optimization in multi-user mobility environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
